message.Name: Unofficial Multitroid
message.Author: DodoBirb, milesthenerd, Jes Right
message.ProfileNotes:
Patch notes: - Ported all general bugfixes from 1v1 Branch
FEATURES: Doomsday timer has been added, the SAX will scale their damage based on how long the match has been going. They will hit max +400% damage once 2/3s of the timer has elapsed and will gain +800% damage and get player icons on their map when the timer hits 0.
The amount of metroids required to open Area 6 can now be changed, when all the required metroids are killed A6 will be opened and all pre-a6 metroids will be removed.
TWEAKS: Bombs no longer cancel speedbooster. Experimental damage multiplier has been removed. Save cooldown added to non-experimental. First Omega and First Alpha cutscenes removed in saxmode. Both teams receive full map on game start. Spidercloaking removes combat healthbars. Frozen players take less damage from missiles. Newgame+ has randomiser anti-softlock measures. Mid combat saving removed.
